mapper.select: SELECT memHelpNum, memHelpTitle, memHelpDate, memCategoryNum, memHelpState FROM MEMHELP ORDER BY MEMHELPNUM DESC
SELECT member_id as memberId, memHelpTitle, memHelpContent FROM MEMHELP WHERE memHelpNum = #{memHelpNum}
SELECT memHelpNum, memHelpTitle, memHelpDate, memCategoryNum, memHelpState FROM MEMHELP WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY MEMHELPNUM DESC

SELECT memHelpNum, memHelpTitle, memHelpContent, memHelpFile, memHelpState, memHelpDate, member_Id as memberId, memCategoryNum FROM MEMHELP WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} and memHelpNum = #{memHelpNum} ORDER BY MEMHELPNUM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMHELP VALUES( MEMHELP_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memHelpTitle}, #{memHelpContent}, #{memHelpFile, jdbcType=BLOB}, #{memHelpState}, #{memHelpDate}, #{memberId}, #{memCategoryNum} )
